MemoryInfobox.image: ACOD FoA JoA Through the Cracks.png
MemoryInfobox.description: 'In search of Alkon (Atlantis)|Alkon's Damades|father, Kassandra visited the adamant Atlantis Latomia|quarry, as it was the last place he was seen alive.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'The Fate of Atlantis: Judgment of Atlantis'
MemoryInfobox.previous: Good From Far, Far From Good
MemoryInfobox.next:
Sixth Sense of Sympathy {{c|concurrent}}
Good From Far, Far From Good

General_Description: '''Through the Cracks''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra helped [[Alkon (Atlantis)|Alkon]] to look for his [[Damades|father]] at the [[adamant]] [[Atlantis Latomia|quarry]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra travelled to the Atlantis Latomia, where Damades worked at. There, she found it to be heavily guarded.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''There's a lot of [[guards]] for a quarry. I wonder why.''
Kassandra entered the quarry, sneaking into the foreman's quarters. She confronted the [[Isu Foreman]] placed in charge of the area.
*'''Isu Foreman:''' ''Welll, isn't this an honor? How'd you get past my guards?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm looking for Damades.''
*'''Isu Foreman:''' ''And why would the great ''[[Dikastes]]'' be looking for missing [[human]]s?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I never said he was missing.''
*'''Isu Foreman:''' ''Very clever, [[hybrid]]. When my humans transport [[adamant]] to the experimentation chamber, they don't always return.''

<tabber>
|-|Tell me where the chamber is.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''A little boy is worried about is Father.  Just tell me where this experimention chamber is.''
*'''Isu Foreman:''' ''Your compassion for humans is unproductive.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Your hatred for humans is self-destructive.''
|-|Threaten – Point me to the chamber, or else.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Tell me where this chamber is or I'll make you eat your precious adamant.''
*'''Isu Foreman:''' ''Primitive. Violence is all your kind understands.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Tell me!''
</tabber>
*'''Isu Foreman:''' ''Fine. It's in the [[Garden of Kymopoleia]]. But you're wasting your time. The doors are locked.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Then I'll just have to find the key.''
*'''Isu Foreman:''' ''You can try, hybrid.''
<tabber>
|-|Kill – Not before killing you.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You know, treating humans like vermin will get you killed one day. That day is today.''
Kassandra eliminated the foreman.
|-|Leave – I'll be going now.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You know, treating humans like vermin will get you killed one day.  Consider yourself lucky I'm not making that day today.''
</tabber>
Kassandra exited the foreman's quarters.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I don't like the sounds of this experimentation chamber. And what do the Isu need with all this adamant?''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra uncovered the location of Damades, who was taken to an experiment chamber at the Garden of Kymopoleia.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' – ''[[The Fate of Atlantis: Judgment of Atlantis]]''

[[Category:Memories of Kassandra]]
